description: Decimal expansion of tangent of 75 degrees.
comments: Also, 2 + sqrt(3) = cotangent of 15 degrees. - _Rick L. Shepherd_, Jul 04 2004An equivalent definition of this sequence: decimal expansion of x > 1 satisfying x^2 - 4*x + 1 = 0. - _Arkadiusz Wesolowski_, Nov 28 2011
links: Ivan Panchenko, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..1000
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_.
